webMethods Sample Server - Client API

The webMethods Sample Server client APIs provide facilities for a Sample Server client to communicate with a Sample Server.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.sample.client Provides the client side connection object to a Sample Server.
com.sample.document Provides the generic data container and data field objects to facilitate the communication between a Sample Server and its clients.

 

The webMethods Sample Server client APIs provide facilities for a Sample Server client to communicate with a Sample Server. The Sample Server is a webMethods-developed backend resource (a simulated bank system) that accompanies the webMethods Sample Adapter. The purpose of the Sample Server and Sample Adapter is to demonstrate the basic development process for creating adapters that run within the webMethods Integration Server environment.
